full_text:
IN THE COURT OF THE JUDICIAL I CLASS MAGISTRATE-V,
(SPECIAL COURT FOR MARK LIST CASES), THIRUVANANTHAPURAM.
Present:-Smt. Aswathy. S, Judicial First Class Magistrate-V,
Thiruvananthapuram.
Monday the 24" day of February, 2025./5" Phalguna, 1946.
CP. 01/2025
Complainant : State of Kerala represented by the Sub Inspector of Police,
Mannanthala Police Station, in Crime No. 525/2024.
(By Assistant Public Prosecutor Sr. Gr, Smt. G. M. Sonia)
Accused : Al. Nidhin Vijayan @ Appu, aged 24/2024 years, S/o. Raveendran,
Vasanthavilasom House, Mahatma Nagar, Leksham Veedu Colony.
Erappukuzhi, Kudappanakunnu Ward, Kudappanakunnu Village,
(from Kizhakkathil Veedu, West Cliff Gardens, YMR Junction,
Nandancode Ward, Kowdiar Village).
A2. Sarath @ Kannan, aged 18/2024 years, S/o. Pradeep, MNWA 14,
Mahatma Nagar, Erappukuzhi Leksham Veedu Colony,
Kudappanakunnu P.O, Kudappanakunnu Village. (Split up).
A3. Rahul @ Kannan, S/o. Manikantan Nair, aged 21/2024 years,
Bindhu Bhavan, Kodivila,) Near Nedumon Nagarkavu Temple,
Nedumon Ward, Kallayam P.O, Vattappara Village.
A4,. Vishnu @ Kuruvi, aged 19/2024 years, S/o. Sathi Kumar,
Mailamoodu Veedu, Mukkolakkal P.O, Pathirappally Ward,
Kudappanakunnu Village.
A5. Sachu, aged 18/2024 years, S/o. Nandhan, Achu House, Vayal
Veedu, Near Kadinamkulam Assarivilakom Temple, Kandavilakom
Ward, Kadinamkulam Village.
For Al to A4 (By Advocate Smt. M.S Preetha Rani)
For A5 (By Advocate Sri. Subash Babu.M)
Offence : Ulss. 143, 147, 149, 294(b), 324, 308, 452, 427, 201 and 506(ii) of
Indian Penal Code, 1860.
Order : The case against the accused Nos. 1, 3, 4 and 5 are committed to
Hon'ble Court of Sessions Thiruvananthapuram u/s.232 of Bharatiya
Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita, 2023. Case against accused No.2 is split up
and refiled as CP. 16/2025.
This case having been heard on today the court on the same day passed the
following:-
ORDER
1. Accused stands charged with the offences punishable u/ss. 143, 147, 149, 294(b),
324, 308, 452, 427, 201 and 506(ii) of Indian Penal Code, 1860.

2 Of 2

2. Prosecution case_in_brief is as follows:- In furtherance of previous animosity
towards CW1 accused No.1 along with accused No, 1 to 5, on 02.06.2024, at 01.15 pm
reached at House No. 141, Erappukuzhi SRO, Pathirappally Ward, where the
informant and his family resides, in two motorcycles. Accused Nos. 1 to 5 trespassed
into the house of CW1, Binu Bhaskar with an intention to commit culpable homicide.
Accused Nos. 1 to 5 broken the glasses of the car bearing registration No. KL.01 BQ
13 stalled at the car shed by pelting stones. Accused No.2 by using a chopper
destroyed the petrol tank of motor cycle bearing registration No. KL 01 BX 1091
stalled CW1 of the house and he again chopped at the gate. Thereafter, accused pelted
stones at the wife, mother and children of CW1. Thus accused Nos. 1 to 5 committed
offences punishable u/ss. 143, 147, 149, 294(b), 324, 308, 452, 427, 201 and 506(ii) of
Indian Penal Code, 1860.

3. On filing final report, the case was taken on file as CP No. 01/2025. When process
served, the accused Nos, 1, 3, 4 and 5 entered appearance. They were enlarged on bail
during crime stage and allowed to continue in the same. Copies of all prosecution
records were furnished them as provided under section 230 of Bharatiya Nagarik
Suraksha Sanhita, 2023. Case against accused No.2 is split up and refiled as CP,
16/2025.

4. On perusal of the case records, it appears to me that the offences alleged against the
accused Nos. 1, 3, 4 and 5 are exclusively triable by the Hon’ble Sessions Court.
Hence, the case is to be committed to the Hon’ble Sessions Court,
Thiruvananthapuram. Therefore, the case is hereby committed to the Hon’ble
Sessions Court, Thiruvananthapuram w/s.232 of Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita,
2023.

5. Issue notice to the Public Prosecutor. Notify him of the committal of the case and
transmit records and material objects to the Hon’ble Sessions Court as per Rules.

6. The accused Nos. 1, 3, 4 and 5 shall appear before the Hon’ble Court of Sessions,
Thiruvananthapuram on issuance of summons.

[Dictated to the Confidential Assistant, transcribed and typed by her, corrected and
pronounced by me in open court this the 24" day of February, 2025]. Sd/-
Judicial I Class Magistrate-V,
Thiruvananthapuram.
// True copy //
